trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Numerics" /> namespace contains numeric types that complement the numeric primitives, such as <see cref="T:System.Byte" />, <see cref="T:System.Double" />, and <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, that are defined by .NET.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Numerics" /> 命名空間包含數值類型，可補充 .NET 所定義的數值基本類型，例如 <see cref="T:System.Byte" />、<see cref="T:System.Double" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: This namespace includes the following types:
trans-unit.target: 此命名空間包含下列類型：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger> structure, which is a nonprimitive integral type that supports arbitrarily large integers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger>結構，也就是支援任意大的整數基本型整數類資料類型。

trans-unit.source: An integral primitive such as <xref:System.Byte> or <xref:System.Int32> includes a `MinValue` and a `MaxValue` property, which define the lower bound and upper bound supported by that data type.
trans-unit.target: 整數類資料的基本類型，例如<xref:System.Byte>或<xref:System.Int32>包含`MinValue`和`MaxValue`屬性，定義該資料類型所支援的上限與下限。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger> structure has no lower or upper bound, and can contain the value of any integer.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger>結構沒有較低或上限，且可以包含的任何整數值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Complex> structure, which represents a complex number.
A complex number is a number in the form *a* + *b*i, where *a* is the real part, and *b* is the imaginary part.
trans-unit.target: 複數是在表單中的數字 + *b*i，其中是真正的一部分，和*b*是虛數部分。

trans-unit.source: The SIMD-enabled vector types, which include <xref:System.Numerics.Vector2>, <xref:System.Numerics.Vector3>, <xref:System.Numerics.Vector4>, <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>, <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix4x4>, <xref:System.Numerics.Plane>, and <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 SIMD 的向量型別，包括<xref:System.Numerics.Vector2>， <xref:System.Numerics.Vector3>， <xref:System.Numerics.Vector4>， <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>， <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix4x4>， <xref:System.Numerics.Plane>，和<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>。
